title: Skipping Stones
description: Gus Harmon has everything a guy could want. . . a fast ship, a hot girl and an AI named Igor that lisps. All he has to do is win this one last race and everything will be perfect. Unfortunately for Gus, speed, love and jealousy don't mix well in outer space, as he is about to learn.This is a short story.
author: Darwin A. Garrison
